title: The Future of AI: Generative Models
description: A deep dive into the latest advancements in generative AI and what they mean for the future of technology.

title: Building Scalable Systems with Microservices
description: Learn the principles of microservice architecture and how to design, build, and deploy scalable and resilient systems.

title: Modern Frontend Development with React and Vite
description: An overview of modern frontend development workflows, focusing on the speed and efficiency of React and Vite.

title: The Quantum Computing Threat to Cryptography
description: Understand the potential impact of quantum computing on current cryptographic standards and explore post-quantum solutions.

title: Data Storytelling: Visualizing Insights
description: Discover how to turn raw data into compelling stories using modern data visualization techniques and tools.

title: DevOps Culture: Beyond the Tools
description: A talk about the cultural and organizational changes needed to successfully implement DevOps practices.
